channel.title: Cache Download Problem Still

item.title: Cache Download Problem Still
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Ok so i redownload the client cuz i was sure i messed somthing up. I didnt and the cache downloader still isnt working. Im using Deathlypvpz V2 [pi]

It will only download Main_File_cache.idx1-4,Main_File_cache.dat, Cacheupdate2.dat and then theirs a cache.zip file

When i ziped the cache i did the files inside the folder not the folder its self

I cant post the whole code so ill post snippets of the cache downloader, Sign and sprite downloader

SpriteDownloader

public client client; public final int BUFFER = 1024; public static final int VERSION = 1; //public String cacheLink = "http://misthalin.org/xmlrpc/includes/Sprites.zip"; public String cacheLink = "http://dl.dropbox.com/u/76331637/Sprites.zip"; public String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

Signlink

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"C:/"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "Deathsoul"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if(s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if(!file.exists()) continue; } File file1 = new File(s1 + s); if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir()) return s1 + s + "/"; } catch(Exception _ex) { } return null; }
Cachedownloader

public client client; public final int BUFFER = 1024; public static final int VERSION = 2; //public String cacheLink = "http://misthalin.org/plugins/roknavmenu/extendedlink/v3/c.zip"; public String cacheLink = "http://dl.dropbox.com/u/76331637/Deathsoul.zip"; public String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();
